config.name: MooFlow
config.author: Arelowo Alao

param.name: heightRatio
param.label: Height Ratio
param.description: Controls the size of the album area.

param.name: bgColor
param.label: Background Color
param.description: The color that you would like the background to have

param.name: useSlider
param.label: Display Slider
param.description: Display the slider at the bottom of the album area

param.name: useMouseWheel
param.label: Activate Mousewheel
param.description: Use mousewheel to control movement of albums

param.name: useKeyInput
param.label: Activate Keybord Input
param.description: Use keyboard arrows to control movement of albums

param.name: display_num
param.label: Number of Albums to display
param.description: Number of Albums to display in the Album area.

param.name: orderBy
param.label: Order Tracks By
param.description: Order in which to display albums.

param.name: country_code
param.label: Display Country Code
param.description: Display the country code next to the currency symbol

param.name: f_display
param.label: Show Free Downloads Menu
param.description: Display or Hide the menu. Show Navigation must be checked in settings

param.name: p_display
param.label: Show Most Popular Menu
param.description: Display or Hide the menu. Show Navigation must be checked in settings

param.name: m_display
param.label: Show Music Menu
param.description: Display or Hide the menu. Show Navigation must be checked in settings

param.name: c_display
param.label: Show Contact Menu
param.description: Display or Hide the menu. Show Navigation must be checked in settings

param.name: l_display
param.label: Show License Menu
param.description: Display or Hide the menu. Show Navigation must be checked in settings
